name: In my world we are together.
name_original: In my world we are together.
description:
This game was made for GMTK 2021 with the theme "Joined Together".

In this game you need to adjust your angle of view to make the couple of lovers stay together, holding hands.

Dedication

In my country, Valentine's Day is celebrated on June 12th. Due to the pandemic, I was unable to be with my girlfriend. This little game is a way to show how much I miss her and that, in my world, we're always together, it's all a matter of point of view!

So, regardless of bugs or whether players like the game or not, this is my way of expressing myself artistically. It's a short game with simple mechanics. Hope you like it!

How to play

Click and drag mouse to adjust camera.

I recomend you to play the PC version.
